reviews.review_msg: His course requirements are extremely strict. He also stated that everyone attending his class must keep their eyes on him the entire time, and he even forbids taking notes. Even minor instances of being late will be singled out by him for comment in every class.
Has 0 compassion for students. He gives daily quizzes which is unbearable for anyone who has a life outside academics.
He cares that students gain knowledge in the class. Loved all his lectures, an absolutely amazing prof. He is very organized and knows his content well.
This person is very disrespectful to students and has made discriminatory comments. He is also a Jew himself. What a joke.

Very boring and lengthy lectures. Lecture slides are so wordy that they resemble textbooks. Halfway through our course, he started treating students like children and locking tardy students outside of the classroom. The class environment was very uncomfortable due to the professor's attitude.
Worst professor ever. Never saw someone who made slides with full texts. This professor was literally reading tens of pages of all-text ppt throughout his class.
AVOID! I did so well on the assignments but bombed the midterms.  The project is horrible.  The marking is super unfair.  This guy needs to get his head sorted out!

She's interesting enough, and really passionate about HR. Course work isn't too onerous. Exams are on the harder side, especially the multiple guess. Overall worth taking the course with her, I'd do it again.
Super hot and super awesome prof!!!
